texts.name: Christian
texts.biography: Christian was always more of a frontiersman than a Knight, having set foot in nearly every part of Enroth before finally settling into military service in Erathia.  Though a wanderer and a bit of a dreamer, his battlefield tactics are feared throughout the world.

specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skill of any Ballista for each level attained after 4th level.
specialty.name: Ballista
